title: Microsoft.NET.StringTools package missing typical metadata
body:
The `Microsoft.NET.StringTools` package appears to build from this repo.

https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/9bcc06cbe19ae2482ab18eab90a82fd079b26897/src/StringTools/StringTools.csproj#L9

Its package description is currently "Package Description":
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3548/125328987-309d7f80-e302-11eb-9d82-2f565856330d.png)
